Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class BALL::TLine3< T >

Generic Line in Three-Dimensional Space.

Member Enumeration Documentation

template<typename T>
enum BALL::TLine3::Form

form of parameter to describe the line: 0 one Point and one Vector. 1 two Points

Enumerator:
FORM__PARAMETER 
FORM__TWO_POINTS
